options.name: Create A User
options.action: Create A User Contacts User
options.description: This API is used to create a user in Contacts when a new employee is employed. After a user is created, only data within the data scope will be returned. For the relationship between data scopes and fields, refer to [App scopes]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uQjN3QjL0YzN04CN2cDN). [FAQs]({{document_base_url}}/ugTN1YjL4UTN24CO1UjN/uQzN1YjL0cTN24CN3UjN). API reference documentation: [Create a user]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/user/create)

options.name: Obtain Single User Information
options.action: Obtain Single User Information Contacts User
options.description: This API is used to obtain the information of a single user in Contacts. [FAQs]({{document_base_url}}/ugTN1YjL4UTN24CO1UjN/uQzN1YjL0cTN24CN3UjN). API reference documentation: [Obtain single user information]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/user/get)

options.name: Modify User Information In Part
options.action: Modify User Information In Part Contacts User
options.description: This API is used to update a user's fields in Contacts. Parameters that are not specified will not be updated. [FAQs]({{document_base_url}}/ugTN1YjL4UTN24CO1UjN/uQzN1YjL0cTN24CN3UjN). API reference documentation: [Modify user information in part]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/user/patch)

options.name: Update User Information In Whole
options.action: Update User Information In Whole Contacts User
options.description: This API is used to update a user's fields in Contacts. [FAQs]({{document_base_url}}/ugTN1YjL4UTN24CO1UjN/uQzN1YjL0cTN24CN3UjN). API reference documentation: [Update user information in whole]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/user/update)

options.name: Delete A User
options.action: Delete A User Contacts User
options.description: This API is used to delete a user from Contacts when an employee is terminated. [FAQs]({{document_base_url}}/ugTN1YjL4UTN24CO1UjN/uQzN1YjL0cTN24CN3UjN). API reference documentation: [Delete a user]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/user/delete)

options.name: Obtain The List Of Users Directly Under A Department
options.value: Obtain The List Of Users Directly Under A Department
options.action: Obtain The List Of Users Directly Under A Department Contacts User
options.description: This API is used to obtain the list of users directly under a department based on the department ID. [FAQs]({{document_base_url}}/ugTN1YjL4UTN24CO1UjN/uQzN1YjL0cTN24CN3UjN). API reference documentation: [Obtain the list of users directly under a department]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/user/find_by_department)

options.name: Obtain User Id Via Email Or Mobile Number
options.value: Obtain User Id Via Email Or Mobile Number
options.action: Obtain User Id Via Email Or Mobile Number Contacts User
options.description: This API is used to obtain user ID information via mobile number or email. The supported ID types are open_id, user_id, and union_id, which can be specified by using the query parameters. API reference documentation: [Obtain user ID via email or mobile number]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/user/batch_get_id)

options.name: Create A Department
options.action: Create A Department Contacts Department
options.description: This API is used to create a department in contacts. [FAQs]({{document_base_url}}/ugTN1YjL4UTN24CO1UjN/uQzN1YjL0cTN24CN3UjN). API reference documentation: [Create a department]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/department/create)

options.name: Obtain Single Department Information
options.action: Obtain Single Department Information Contacts Department
options.description: This API is used to obtain the information of a single department in contacts. For details, refer to [FAQs]({{document_base_url}}/ugTN1YjL4UTN24CO1UjN/uQzN1YjL0cTN24CN3UjN). API reference documentation: [Obtain single department information]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/department/get)

options.name: Modify Department Information In Part
options.action: Modify Department Information In Part Contacts Department
options.description: This API is used to update any department field in contacts. [FAQs]({{document_base_url}}/ugTN1YjL4UTN24CO1UjN/uQzN1YjL0cTN24CN3UjN). API reference documentation: [Modify department information in part]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/department/patch)

options.name: Update Department Information In Whole
options.action: Update Department Information In Whole Contacts Department
options.description: This API is used to update all information of the current department. [FAQs]({{document_base_url}}/ugTN1YjL4UTN24CO1UjN/uQzN1YjL0cTN24CN3UjN). API reference documentation: [Update department information in whole]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/department/update)

options.name: Delete A Department
options.action: Delete A Department Contacts Department
options.description: This API is used to delete a department from contacts. [FAQs]({{document_base_url}}/ugTN1YjL4UTN24CO1UjN/uQzN1YjL0cTN24CN3UjN). API reference documentation: [Delete a department]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/department/delete)

options.name: Obtain The List Of Sub Departments
options.value: Obtain The List Of Sub Departments
options.action: Obtain The List Of Sub Departments Contacts Department
options.description: This API is used to obtain the list of sub-departments by using the department ID. [FAQs]({{document_base_url}}/ugTN1YjL4UTN24CO1UjN/uQzN1YjL0cTN24CN3UjN). API reference documentation: [Obtain the list of sub-departments]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/department/children)

options.name: Obtain Parent Department Information
options.action: Obtain Parent Department Information Contacts Department
options.description: This API is used to recursively obtain the information of parent departments, and return the list of the information of parent departments within the permission scope from child departments to parent departments. [FAQs]({{document_base_url}}/ugTN1YjL4UTN24CO1UjN/uQzN1YjL0cTN24CN3UjN). API reference documentation: [Obtain parent department information]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/department/parent)

options.name: Search For Departments
options.action: Search For Departments Contacts Department
options.description: This API is used to search for department data with keywords. Department visibility is set by administrators in Admin. [FAQs]({{document_base_url}}/ugTN1YjL4UTN24CO1UjN/uQzN1YjL0cTN24CN3UjN). API reference documentation: [Search for departments]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/department/search)

options.name: Change Department Group To Common Group
options.value: Change Department Group To Common Group
options.action: Change Department Group To Common Group Contacts Department
options.description: Use this api to change department group to common group. API reference documentation: [Change department group to common group]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/department/unbind_department_chat)

options.name: Add Members To A User Group
options.value: Add Members To A User Group
options.action: Add Members To A User Group Contacts User Group User Group Member
options.description: This API is used to add members to a user group (members can only be users currently, and can also be departments in the future). If the app's contact scope is "All employees", you can add any member to any user group. If not, you can only add members in the contact scope to the user groups in the contact scope. [Click to learn about the range of contacts data that an app can access]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uETNz4SM1MjLxUzM/v3/guides/scope_authority). API reference documentation: [Add members to a user group]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/group-member/add)

options.name: Remove Members From A User Group
options.value: Remove Members From A User Group
options.action: Remove Members From A User Group Contacts User Group User Group Member
options.description: This API is used to remove members from a user group (members can only be users currently, and can also be departments in the future). If the app's contact scope is "All employees", you can remove any member from any user group. If not, you can only remove members in the contact scope from the user groups in the contact scope. [Click to learn about the range of contacts data that an app can access]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uETNz4SM1MjLxUzM/v3/guides/scope_authority). API reference documentation: [Remove members from a user group]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/group-member/remove)

options.name: Query The List Of Members In A User Group
options.value: Query The List Of Members In A User Group
options.action: Query The List Of Members In A User Group Contacts User Group User Group Member
options.description: This API is used to query the member list of a user group (members can only be users currently, and can also be departments in the future). If the app's contact scope is "All employees", you can query the member list of any user group in the company. If not, you can only query the member list of the user groups in the app's contact scope. [Click to learn about the range of contacts data that an app can access]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uETNz4SM1MjLxUzM/v3/guides/scope_authority). API reference documentation: [Query the list of members in a user group]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/group-member/simplelist)

options.name: Create A User Group
options.action: Create A User Group Contacts User Group
options.description: This API is used to create a user group. Note that the app's contact scope must be "All employees" so as to create a user group. [Click to learn about the range of contacts data that an app can access]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uETNz4SM1MjLxUzM/v3/guides/scope_authority). API reference documentation: [Create a user group]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/group/create)

options.name: Update A User Group
options.action: Update A User Group Contacts User Group
options.description: This API is used to update user group information. Note that the app's contact scope must be "All employees" so as to update a user group. [Click to learn about the range of contacts data that an app can access]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uETNz4SM1MjLxUzM/v3/guides/scope_authority). API reference documentation: [Update a user group]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/group/patch)

options.name: Delete A User Group
options.action: Delete A User Group Contacts User Group
options.description: This API is used to delete a user group from a company. Note that the app's contact scope must be "All employees" so as to delete a user group. [Click to learn about the range of contacts data that an app can access]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uETNz4SM1MjLxUzM/v3/guides/scope_authority). API reference documentation: [Delete a user group]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/group/delete)

options.name: Query A User Group
options.action: Query A User Group Contacts User Group
options.description: This API is used to query the basic information of a user group by user group ID. Make sure that the app's contact scope includes the user group or is "All employees". [Click to learn about the range of contacts data that an app can access]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uETNz4SM1MjLxUzM/v3/guides/scope_authority). API reference documentation: [Query a user group]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/group/get)

options.name: Query The List Of User Groups
options.value: Query The List Of User Groups
options.action: Query The List Of User Groups Contacts User Group
options.description: This API is used to query the user group list of a company. If the app's contact scope is "All employees", you can obtain all user groups in the company. If not, you can only obtain the user groups in the app's contact scope. [Click to learn about the range of contacts data that an app can access]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uETNz4SM1MjLxUzM/v3/guides/scope_authority). API reference documentation: [Query the list of user groups]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/group/simplelist)

options.name: Create A Unit
options.action: Create A Unit Contacts Unit
options.description: To use this API to create a unit, you must have the scope to update the unit. Note: Unit is available on Enterprise Edition only. Companies must activate this edition before they can create units. API reference documentation: [Create a unit]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/unit/create)

options.name: Obtain Units In Batches
options.action: Obtain Units In Batches Contacts Unit
options.description: To obtain a company's units by calling this API, you must have the scope to obtain the units. API reference documentation: [Obtain units in batches]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/unit/list)

options.name: Modify Unit Information
options.action: Modify Unit Information Contacts Unit
options.description: To call this API, you must have the scope to update the unit. Note: Unit is available on Enterprise Edition only. Companies must activate this edition before they can modify units. API reference documentation: [Modify unit information]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/unit/patch)

options.name: Delete Units
options.action: Delete Units Contacts Unit
options.description: To delete a unit by calling this API, you must have the scope to update the unit. If the type of the unit is used by another business, it cannot be deleted. API reference documentation: [Delete units]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/unit/delete)

options.name: Obtain Unit Information
options.action: Obtain Unit Information Contacts Unit
options.description: To obtain unit information by calling this API, you must have the scope to obtain unit information. API reference documentation: [Obtain unit information]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/unit/get)

options.name: Associate A Department With A Unit
options.value: Associate A Department With A Unit
options.action: Associate A Department With A Unit Contacts Unit
options.description: To associate a department with a unit by calling this API, you must have the scopes to update the unit and department's contacts permissions. Unit is available on Enterprise Edition only. Companies must activate this edition before they can complete association. API reference documentation: [Associate a department with a unit]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/unit/bind_department)

options.name: Dissociate A Department With A Unit
options.value: Dissociate A Department With A Unit
options.action: Dissociate A Department With A Unit Contacts Unit
options.description: To dissociate a department with a unit by calling this API, you must have the scopes to update the unit and department's contacts permissions. Unit is available on Enterprise Edition only. Companies must activate this edition before they complete dissociation. API reference documentation: [Dissociate a department with a unit]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/unit/unbind_department)

options.name: Obtain The List Of Departments Associated With A Unit
options.value: Obtain The List Of Departments Associated With A Unit
options.action: Obtain The List Of Departments Associated With A Unit Contacts Unit
options.description: To obtain the department list bound to the unit through this interface API reference documentation: [Obtain the list of departments associated with a unit]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/unit/list_department)

options.name: Query The Workforce Type
options.action: Query The Workforce Type Contacts Workforce Type
options.description: This API is used to obtain an employee's workforce type. API reference documentation: [Query the workforce type]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/employee_type_enum/list)

options.name: Add A Workforce Type
options.action: Add A Workforce Type Contacts Workforce Type
options.description: This API is used to add a workforce type. API reference documentation: [Add a workforce type]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/employee_type_enum/create)

options.name: Update The Workforce Type
options.action: Update The Workforce Type Contacts Workforce Type
options.description: Update the custom workforce type API reference documentation: [Update the workforce type]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/employee_type_enum/update)

options.name: Delete Workforce Types
options.action: Delete Workforce Types Contacts Workforce Type
options.description: This API is used to delete custom workforce types. API reference documentation: [Delete workforce types]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/employee_type_enum/delete)

options.name: Obtain Custom User Fields Of A Company
options.value: Obtain Custom User Fields Of A Company
options.action: Obtain Custom User Fields Of A Company Contacts Custom User Fields
options.description: Obtain customer user field configuration of a company API reference documentation: [Obtain custom user fields of a company]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/custom_attr/list)

options.name: Obtain The Range Of Contacts Data That An App Can Access
options.value: Obtain The Range Of Contacts Data That An App Can Access
options.action: Obtain The Range Of Contacts Data That An App Can Access Contacts Contact Scope
options.description: This API is used to obtain the range of contacts data that an app is authorized to access, including the department list, user list, and user group list. If the access range is all employees, all the first-level departments of the company will be returned. Otherwise, the departments that the administrator selected when setting the access range (excluding sub-departments of selected departments) will be returned. API reference documentation: [Obtain the range of contacts data that an app can access]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/contact-v3/scope/list)

name: user_id
description: User ID, which must match the user_id_type in the query parameter.
